        % 페이지 전체 이미지 + 표지 제목 (중상단)
        \newcommand{\CoverPage}[2]{%
          \thispagestyle{empty}%
          \begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture,overlay]
            % background image
            \node[inner sep=0pt] at (current page.center) {%
              \includegraphics[width=\paperwidth,height=\paperheight]{#1}%
            };

            % subtle highlight (very light, upward)
            \node[
              align=center,
              text=white,
              opacity=0.25,
              font=\bfseries\fontsize{44}{52}\selectfont
            ] at ($(current page.north)+(0,-0.22\paperheight)+(0,0.6pt)$) {#2};

            % main text (neutral gray)
            \node[
              align=center,
              text={rgb,255:red,68;green,68;blue,68}, % #444444
              font=\bfseries\fontsize{44}{52}\selectfont
            ] at ($(current page.north)+(0,-0.22\paperheight)$) {#2};
          \end{tikzpicture}
        }

        % 페이지 전체 이미지 + 하단 자막 (중앙)
        \newcommand{\ScenePage}[2]{%
          \thispagestyle{empty}%
          \begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture,overlay]
            % background image
            \node[inner sep=0pt] at (current page.center) {%
              \includegraphics[width=\paperwidth,height=\paperheight]{#1}%
            };

            % subtle highlight
            \node[
              align=center,
              text=white,
              opacity=0.25,
              font=\fontsize{26}{32}\selectfont
            ] at ($(current page.south)+(0,0.10\paperheight)+(0,0.5pt)$) {#2};

            % main text
            \node[
              align=center,
              text={rgb,255:red,68;green,68;blue,68}, % #444444
              font=\fontsize{26}{32}\selectfont
            ] at ($(current page.south)+(0,0.10\paperheight)$) {#2};
          \end{tikzpicture}
        }
mainfont: "Noto Serif CJK KR"
